mapper.select: select A.Cus_Code, A.Cus_Name, A.Cus_Status, B.CHILD_TBL_TYPE Cus_Status_Name, A.Cus_Clsfc, C.CHILD_TBL_TYPE Cus_Clsfc_Name, A.Cus_Rprsn, A.Cus_Mng, A.Cus_Co, A.Cus_Co_EstYr, A.Cus_Rprsn_PhNr, A.Cus_Mng_PhNr, A.Cus_Mng_Email, A.Cus_Adr, A.Cus_Pymn_Date, D.CHILD_TBL_TYPE Cus_Pymn_Date_Name, A.Cus_Rgstr_Nr from Customer_tbl A inner join ( select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE=15 ) B on A.Cus_Status = B.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join ( select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE=28 ) C on A.Cus_Clsfc = C.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join ( select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE=39 ) D on A.Cus_Pymn_Date = D.CHILD_TBL_NO
